name: Dead Root, Eye of Newt
description:
As a witch in your beloved herbaceous hut, the forest has been influenced by something sinister. But you have the power of alchemy and your adorable plants to keep you alive until you find a way to purify the lovely forest you call home! Make potions! Tend to your plants! Fight back! And keep the roots you call home alive, until you find a way to purify this overgrowth of evil! 

Credits: 

Vinh Pham - Design & Tech Art

Kelly Alexander - 3D & 2D Art
